title: Customer Service Representive
job_overview:
Job Opening: Experienced Customer Service VA (Shopify + Fashion Dropshipping) – Long-Term Role. We’re on the lookout for a skilled and dependable Customer Service Virtual Assistant to join our fast-moving, fashion-focused e-commerce business. If you have a strong background in Shopify customer support and are familiar with the pace and demands of fashion dropshipping, this could be the perfect long-term opportunity for you.

What We’re Looking For:

At least 2 years of experience in e-commerce customer support

Must have hands-on experience with Shopify

Comfortable working with Google Sheets

Excellent written English with a professional, friendly tone

Fast learner who works efficiently and communicates clearly

Reliable high-speed internet connection

Having backup internet and/or power is a big advantage

Full-time availability and commitment to a long-term position

Your Personality & Work Style:

You’re proactive, dependable, and solution-oriented

You take full ownership of your tasks and follow through

You can stick to SOPs but aren’t afraid to think independently

You bring positive energy and enjoy being part of a team

You’re looking for stability, personal growth, and a secure long-term role

What You’ll Be Doing:

Responding to customer inquiries via email using Shopify and our helpdesk tools

Processing returns, refunds, and order adjustments

Handling shipping issues and tracking updates

Keeping internal records organized in Google Sheets

Communicating with suppliers when necessary

Submitting weekly updates and reporting recurring issues

What We Offer:

A stable, long-term position within a supportive team

On-time weekly payments

A respectful, high-performance remote work culture

Opportunities to grow and take on more responsibility over time

100% remote – work from the comfort of your home

How to Apply:

Please send us the following:

A brief introduction about yourself

Your resume

A short video (1–2 minutes) introducing yourself and explaining your Shopify customer service experience

A screenshot of your internet speed test (from speedtest.net)

Let us know if you have backup internet and/or power

Important: This role is only open to candidates with proven experience in Shopify, Google Sheets, and e-commerce customer service. Please do not apply if you do not meet these requirements.

We're excited to welcome someone who’s fast, experienced, and ready to grow with us long-term. Think you're the right fit? We’d love to hear from you.
